title: FTX diverted $200 million of customer money for two venture deals that caught the SEC's attention
description: As Sam Bankman-Fried was using FTX customer money for all sorts of risky trading and lending, he was also making large venture investments.

title: AMC shares hit 52-week low as recent moves and gimmicks fail to win over investors
description: Shares of AMC Entertainment have fallen more than 85% so far this year, sinking below $4.

title: 'Avatar: The Way of Water' crosses $1B in ticket sales in just 14 days: Here are the 10 highest-grossing movies of 2022
description: With 'Avatar 2' crossing the $1 billion mark this week, the 2022 box office tripled the number of billion-dollar grossers from 2021.

title: U.S. will require airline passengers traveling from China to test negative for Covid
'Avatar' sequel eclipses $1 billion at global box office, even with Covid weighing on China business
description: Worldwide ticket sales for Disney and James Cameron's "Avatar: The Way of Water" have topped $1 billion.

title: U.S. records 100 million Covid cases, but more than 200 million Americans have probably had it
description: As the U.S. enters the fourth year of the pandemic, the virus keeps mutating into more transmissible variants, making it even more difficult to control.

title: The fintech reckoning is upon us. Here’s what to expect next year
description: Many fintech startups will be forced to shutter or sell themselves as they run out of funding in 2023, according to investors, founders and investment bankers.

title: Putin attempts to undermine oil price cap as global energy markets fracture
description: Oil markets are more "divided, more politically charged" than ever — but are likely to shake off Russia's export ban announcement in the short term.

title: Tesla made headlines in 2022, but the top-performing auto stock had nothing to do with EVs
description: The year in automotive stocks wasn't just about Elon Musk and Tesla. There were losses across the board, but some didn't lose so much.

title: Dow headed back below 30,000, slim chance of soft landing for economy in 2023: CNBC CFO survey
description: CFOs expect the Dow Jones Industrial Average to fall below 30,000 and the economy to enter a recession next year, according to a CNBC survey.

title: Zelenskyy, BlackRock CEO Fink agree to coordinate Ukraine investment
description: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy and BlackRock CEO Larry Fink have agreed to coordinate investment in rebuilding Ukraine, Kyiv announced on Wednesday

title: Crypto exchange Kraken to shutter its Japan operations after global layoffs
description: Crypto exchange Kraken said Wednesday that it will stop operations in Japan next month, blaming a "weak crypto market globally."

title: Global economy is heading into a decade of low growth, economist says
description: The global economy likely faces a decade of sluggish growth, according to Daniel Lacalle, author and chief economist at Tressis Gestion.

title: A long-term illness crisis is threatening the UK economy
description: The number of "economically inactive" people — those neither working nor looking for a job — between the ages of 16 and 64 has risen by over 630,000 since 2019.

title: U.S. weighs new measures for travelers from China as Japan says it will require negative Covid tests
description: The U.S. officials noted Malaysia is also taking measures while India and the WHO have expressed their concern about the situation in China.

title: A former exec from Stripe and Uber is 'OK to give up 100x growth' to build a new business that will last
description: Vidit Agrawal of Indonesian startup GajiGesa says crazy growth is nice. But staying power is better.

title: Prevent burnout by spotting these red and green flags before taking the job
description: While burnout is caused by a variety of factors, one thing remains in your control — the company that you choose to work for.
